channel.title: The Hacker Crackdown
channel.description: Cory Doctorow reads Bruce Sterlings The Hacker Crackdown

item.title: The Hacker Crackdown, Part 28
item.description: Cory Doctorow reads Bruce Sterling's brilliant, seminal book The Hacker Crackdown, a 1992 book that recounts the events that led to the founding of The Electronic Frontier Foundation
